channel.title: [PI] Need Help with barrows
channel.description:
Alright so when i use the spade on the Ahrim and Guthans hill this is where it takes me
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DOxPpZm.png[/img]
I've searched the coordinates and they are correct. If I go to any other hills they take me to the correct place, but if i use ::tele while in the tunnels and go to the coords of the bugged places, it will take me into that tunnel with no problem. But then if im in the Ahrim tunnel without the bug, and relog, it bugs again. Please, this is a terrible issue. I've been trying to fix it for ages.

item.title: [PI] Need Help with barrows
item.dc:creator: @omfgamrange omfgamrange
item.description:
@omfgamrange wrote:

The resting places are bugged. And the height is fine, becuase if i find a way to the tombs and relog in the bugged area, it turns black after i log in again

Read full topic
